ref.title: Physicochemical and thermodynamic properties of the {1-alkyl-1-methylmorpholinium bromide, [C1Cn=3,4,5MOR]Br, or 1-methyl-1-pentylpiperidinium bromide, [C1C5PIP]Br + water} binary systems
ref.full: Zawadzki, M.; Krolikowska, M.; Antonowicz, J.; Lipinski, P.; Karpinska, M. (2016) J. Chem. Thermodyn. 98, 324-337.

components.name: 1-methyl-1-pentylpiperidinium bromide
sample: 0.3520 water mass %(crystallization from solution;dried by vacuum heating)

title: Phase transition properties: Normal melting temperature
